sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ROUTES from "../../app/routes"; // import selector import { selectTopics } from "./topicsSlice"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; /** * Topics component renders a list of topics and provides a link to create a new topic. * * This component uses the `useSelector` hook to retrieve the list of topics from the Redux store. * Each topic is displayed as a clickable link that navigates to the topic's details page. * The component also includes a button to navigate to the "Create New Topic" page. * * @component * * @returns {JSX.Element} The rendered Topics component. * * @example * // Example usage: * * * @dependencies * - `useSelector`: A Redux hook to access the state. * - `selectTopics`: A selector function to retrieve topics from the Redux state. * - `ROUTES.topicRoute`: A function to generate the route for a specific topic. * - `ROUTES.newTopicRoute`: A function to generate the route for creating a new topic. * - `Link`: A React Router component for navigation. */ export default function Topics() { const topics = useSelector(selectTopics); // replace this with a call to your selector to select all the topics in state return (

Topics

    {Object.values(topics).map((topic) => (

  • {topic.name}

    {topic.quizIds.length} Quizzes

    • ))}
Create New Topic
); }
